buttons.label: Profile Fitment Form
buttons.whatsappText:
It was a pleasure speaking with you earlier today. Here is the Profile Fitment form. Please ensure you fill it at your earliest convenience, so that we can better understand how to serve you better.
Link: https://rebrand.ly/crio-profile-fitment-form
Should you have any questions or require further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.

buttons.label: Brochure
buttons.whatsappText:
Following up on our conversation, I wanted to share a little more detail about the program we discussed.
You can check out the curriculum of the *Fellowship Program in Full Stack Development (FSD)* here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YfxkSHKgM-XKs-waX9iiq0dLruvDfoRJ/view?usp=sharing.
This will give you a detailed understanding of all the concepts you will master throughout your learning journey at Crio.
If you have any questions on this, feel free to reach out to me.

buttons.label: Portfolio
buttons.whatsappText:
Your journey at Crio does not end with just building projects. Simultaneously you will be building a rockstar portfolio to impress recruiters and land your dream job.
Here's how your portfolio will look like soon: https://www.crio.do/learn/portfolio/qa-masters/?name={LEARNER_NAME_PLACEHOLDER}

buttons.label: On-Demand Session
buttons.whatsappText:
We are pleased to offer you a chance to attend a exclusive trial session led by a Senior Software Development Engineer II at Microsoft. This session is designed for those aiming to excel as an SDE (Software Development Engineer).

What's in Store for You:
◉ Career Planning: Receive personalized career guidance from top industry experts.
◉ Hands-on Project Work: Gain practical experience working on real-world scenarios from companies like Flipkart, Netflix, and Amazon.
◉ Exclusive Access to Experts: Interact with seasoned professionals from top companies such as Microsoft, Uber, and Google.

This is a unique opportunity to jumpstart your career and learn from one of the best in the industry.

Join Now: https://www.crio.do/magic/odt-sf-software-development

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me.

buttons.label: On-Demand Session
buttons.whatsappText:
You're invited to a exclusive trial session with a Technical Program Manager at Walmart with over 12 years of experience. 
This session is tailored to help you launch a successful career as an SDET (Software Development Engineer in Test).

What You'll Learn:
◉ Personalized Career Guidance: Create your career plan with expert advice.
◉ Hands-on Experience: Get practical experience working on projects for top companies like Flipkart, Netflix, and Amazon.
◉ Industry Expert Interaction: Engage directly with professionals from leading tech firms such as Microsoft, Uber, and Google.
Seize this chance to accelerate your career growth with direct mentorship and practical knowledge.

Join Now: https://www.crio.do/magic/odt-sf-qa-automation

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me.

buttons.label: Portfolio
On-Demand Session
buttons.whatsappText:
We're excited to invite you to our free trial session led by Kiran Suresh, a founding team member of Crio.Do and former Motorola expert. In this hands-on session, you'll gain invaluable insights into building your career as a Data Analytics Professional.

Why Attend?
◉ Personalized Career Plan: Get a customized roadmap to advance in the data analytics field.
◉ Hands-on Experience: Work on projects similar to those at top companies like Flipkart, Netflix, and Amazon.
Don't miss this opportunity to interact with industry experts and gain practical knowledge that can propel your career forward.

Join Now: https://www.crio.do/magic/odt-sf-ai-data-analytics

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me.
